DataElement.preferredName: Patient Limb Amputation Other Reason Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The other reason amputation was done.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Limb Amputation Other Reason Specify
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity._The surgical removal of all or part of a limb or other appendage._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action._Be specific about something; define clearly.
